# Break Inside

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                             | Support     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------|
| `break-inside-auto`               | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `break-inside-avoid`              | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `break-inside-avoid-page`         | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `break-inside-avoid-column`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
